Key.value: Oh, je viens de Leithana.Je suis un observateur novice.Si jamais vous en avez l'occasion, vous devriez certainement visiter Leithana.

I'm here on my first field assignment. I consider myself really lucky. Other guys from my course had to go to the Salty Lakes or the Fiery Fields. Ugh.
